title: Ukrainians in embattled east mark third Easter under fire | REUTERS
text: In Ukraineâ€™s embattled east, chaplain Yevhen Savchenko of the 93rd Mechanized Brigade helped tired troops observe the Orthodox Easter holiday at an undisclosed location while President Volodymyr Zelenskiy called on Ukrainians to unite in prayer. #News #russiaukrainewar #army #Reuters #Newsfeed Read the story here: https://reut.rs/3QwunOP ????
